location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to James Farish, Acting Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the commands of the Bombay Government dated 20 December 1811, which granted permission for the Resident to take leave from his post. It notes that William Bruce intends to depart Bushire upon the return of the Country Ship Moholar.
